list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Customer form "Save" implementation complete
-customers "Update" button functional
-Refactored "AddUpdateCustomerController" to "CustomerController"
-Refactored "AddUpdateCustomer" FXML file to "Customer"
-JavaDocs filled out for customer methods in Main Form controller
TODO's & FIXME's in place

task.summary:
Initial commit: file structure set-up and connected to local RDB server
Login GUI screen complete and properly displaying EN & FR
"ValidationUtils" & "AlertUtils" classes created in Utilities package
Form validation started on Login form, alerts displaying in EN & FR
README file started
TODO's & FIXME's in place

feat: "Login" form now complete with credentials validation & changes scene to "MainForm"
"MainForm" FXML and controller files created/connected
"AddCustomer" FXML and controller files created/connected
"SceneUtils" class created for scene changing methods
"Logout" button on "MainForm" now functional
TODO's & FIXME's in place

feat: All "model" package classes for objects built
TODO's & FIXME's in place

feat: "ComboBoxInterface" created/"filter" lambda expression implemented
-ComboBoxes on "Customer" form now fully functional
-CountryDAO & DivisionDAO created/implemented
-Renamed Customer form FXML file & controller
-Cleaned up unnecessary code & added explanatory comments
TODO's & FIXME's in place

feat: All customers and appointments now showing in respective tableviews on Main form
-CustomerDAO & AppointmentDAO classes created w/ database methods
-Login form disabled for testing purposes
TODO's & FIXME's in place

feat: Customer & Appointment "delete" buttons now functional w/ alerts
-Comments added to various methods and class variables
TODO's & FIXME's in place

feat: Customer "Add" & "Delete" buttons tested and now fully functional
-Save button now functional for adding a new customer
-Form validation completed for Customer form
TODO's & FIXME's in place

feat: Customer form "Save" implementation complete
-customers "Update" button functional
-Refactored "AddUpdateCustomerController" to "CustomerController"
-Refactored "AddUpdateCustomer" FXML file to "Customer"
-JavaDocs filled out for customer methods in Main Form controller
TODO's & FIXME's in place
